subject: Write the full research paper draft
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Write the complete Gartner-style research paper "Your AI Coding Agents Are Only as Good as Your Harness" following the plan structure. The paper should be 15-20 pages in markdown, targeting VPs of Engineering, CTOs, and Directors of Platform Engineering.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Paper covers all sections from the plan (Abstract, Sections 1-6, Glossary)
- [ ] Authoritative Gartner analyst tone throughout
- [ ] All key sources cited with specific quotes/findings
- [ ] Includes all suggested additions (Invisible Tax, Security Angle, Comparison Table, First 90 Days, etc.)
- [ ] Written to `/Users/cody/workspace/ai-coding-harness-paper.md`
- [ ] 15-20 pages equivalent in markdown

**Verification:**
- type: manual-check
- command: `wc -l /Users/cody/workspace/ai-coding-harness-paper.md`
- expected: 800+ lines (15-20 page equivalent)

learnings: The Anthropic 'Building effective agents' post does NOT use the word 'harness' - the term was introduced in 'Effective harnesses for long-running agents' (Nov 2025)
Pixee.ai '87% lack AI security frameworks' stat is unverifiable - the correct stat is '79% lack formal security policies' from Enterprise Management Associates
ThoughtWorks placed spec-driven development in Assess ring (Vol 33, Nov 2025), not 'most important practice' - need to soften that attribution
